amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Procurement, Defense-Wide, by $10 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by a similar amount in order to address breast cancer research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Procurement, Defense-Wide, by $10 million and to increase funding for Defense Health Program (breast cancer research) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
